questions.text: Brian has worms during this episode.
questions.explanation:
True.

	In the beginning of the episode, this is revealed and Brian is unable to afford the medicine for his worms.  Throughout the episode, Stewie tries to help Brian get three hundred dollars for his medicine.

questions.text: What award did Stewie once hand out?
questions.explanation:
A Grammy.

	Stewie was going to award the Album of the Year to Justin Timberlake, but he ended up knocking Justin out with the award and gave it to Nelly.  According to Stewie, it was one of the best awards he has given out.

questions.text: How old was Lois when she was Miss Teen Rhode Island?
questions.explanation:
Sixteen & 16.

	When she won the competition, Lois was excited to get into a modeling career, but her father ended up preventing her from getting into it.  After the family beats Mr. Peuderschmidt in a yacht race, Lois decides to do the things her father wouldn't let her do.

questions.text: What does Peter use as a makeshift yacht in the Newport Regatta?
questions.explanation:
A bathtub.

	During the race, the family decides to try and beat Lois' father.  Lois races to rebel against everything that her father wouldn't let her do in the past.  They end up winning the race.

questions.text: Who does Peter throw out of his makeshift yacht to lose weight?
questions.explanation:
Meg.

	When Peter realizes that Lois' father is catching up to them, Peter decides that the boat needs less weight in it, so he has the family throw their clothes out of the boat.  Since the boat still isn't winning, he throws Meg out of the boat and they win the race.

questions.text: Who does Lois first model for?
questions.explanation:
Mort.

	Since Mort's pharmacy is losing business, Lois recommends that he make a catalog that she can model in.  After doing this, Lois is approached by a talent agent, and she starts to get work.

questions.text: Lois ends up modeling for Cosmopolitan.  What other magazine does Lois end up modeling for?
questions.explanation:
Victoria's Secret.

	After her newfound success, Peter ends up taking Lois to The Drunken Clam, and all of the guys treat her like a stripper.  Peter tries to tell Lois to stop, but she's enjoying herself too much to care.

questions.text: What is written on Brian's mug in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Life's a beach.

	To get rich, Stewie invests in a scam that sells different products and he lets Brian be an employee to earn money for his worm medicine.  Stewie says that the mug is offensive to the other employees, but Brian is the only employee.

questions.text: What is not written on a picture in Stewie's office?
questions.explanation:
Focus.

	Stewie ends up firing Brian for no apparent reason, and we never actually find out if Brian got enough money for his medicine.  Stewie's office also includes a large desk and a toy phone with the voices of "Sesame Street" characters.

questions.text: What does Lois' father end up making Peter eat?
questions.explanation:
A pine cone.

	Mr. Pewderschmidt tells Peter to eat the pine cone or else he won't help Peter stop Lois from ruining her life.  After retrieving Lois from the Vogue party, Peter makes her realize that she doesn't need to be modeling anymore.
